医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明试管受精移植日不会影响整体成功率在体外受精治疗中，传统上在受精后三天将胚胎移植到子宫中。由于实验室技术的改进，现在五天后也可以实现这一点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/IVF-transfer-day-does-not-impact-overall-success-rates-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/IVF-transfer-day-does-not-impact-overall-success-rates-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=510d2446-6db2-43d8-9e7b-2fbdb6599dd0 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 13:39:09 -0400 IVF transfer day does not impact overall success rates, study reveals
治疗后生活方式的选择影响乳腺癌患者的长期结果丹娜—法伯癌症研究所研究人员领导的三项研究对乳腺癌患者具有令人鼓舞的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Post-treatment-lifestyle-choices-influence-long-term-outcomes-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Post-treatment-lifestyle-choices-influence-long-term-outcomes-in-breast-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=de3971d6-d252-46de-8df8-eac7f3354fa9 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 13:24:54 -0400 Post-treatment lifestyle choices influence long-term outcomes in breast cancer patients
加州大学圣地亚哥分校健康中心在手术室试验空间计算技术加州大学圣地亚哥分校健康中心的微创外科医生是全美第一个评估 Apple Vision Pro 空间计算应用程序在手术室中的潜在用途的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/UC-San-Diego-Health-trials-spatial-computing-technology-in-operating-room.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/UC-San-Diego-Health-trials-spatial-computing-technology-in-operating-room.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dcda615e-90b1-4a4c-9768-e318bba986d5 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 13:17:26 -0400
LJI 的突破为针对丝状病毒的通用抗病毒药物带来了希望目前，世界上几乎没有工具来对抗致命的丝状病毒，例如埃博拉病毒和马尔堡病毒。唯一获得批准的疫苗和抗体治疗只能预防一种丝状病毒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/LJI-breakthrough-offers-hope-for-universal-antiviral-against-filoviruses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/LJI-breakthrough-offers-hope-for-universal-antiviral-against-filoviruses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4d1dcdda-9222-47d2-a131-0de883a92e2d Tue, 17 Sep 2024 13:09:10 -0400 LJI breakthrough offers hope for universal antiviral against filoviruses
新的 326 万美元拨款在纽约推出未确诊疾病网络网站美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 下属的国家神经疾病和中风研究所 (NINDS) 提供了一项为期四年、价值 326 万美元的新拨款，在纽约大都市区建立了第一个未确诊疾病网络 (UDN) 站点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/New-24326-million-grant-launches-Undiagnosed-Diseases-Network-site-in-New-York.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/New-24326-million-grant-launches-Undiagnosed-Diseases-Network-site-in-New-York.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74a8f8e7-ba56-4d3a-abb8-84e2b5ad71fa Tue, 17 Sep 2024 12:55:44 -0400 New $3.26 million grant launches Undiagnosed Diseases Network site in New York
适量喝咖啡可降低多种心脏代谢疾病的风险根据内分泌学会《临床内分泌与代谢杂志》上发表的新研究，定期摄入适量的咖啡和咖啡因可能对多种心脏代谢疾病（包括 2 型糖尿病、冠心病和中风）的发生有预防作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Moderate-coffee-conspiration-linked-to-lower-risk-of-multiple-cardiometabolic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Moderate-coffee-conspiration-linked-to-lower-risk-of-multiple-cardiometabolic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4e66b4b-3be7-432c-ba5b-a1dba44c34c4 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 12:33:53 -0400 Moderate coffee consumption linked to lower risk of multiple cardiometabolic diseases
黑加仑补充剂有望预防绝经后女性骨质密度下降随着年龄的增长，我们的骨骼密度会降低，变得更加脆弱，使我们面临骨折的危险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Blackcurrant-supplements-show-promise-in-preventing-bone-densis-loss-in-post-menopausal-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Blackcurrant-supplements-show-promise-in-preventing-bone- Density-loss-in-post-menopausal-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=878e1a14-5ad4-4b99-a3a2-bf1e62269479 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 12:23:55 -0400 Blackcurrant supplements show promise in preventing bone density loss in post-menopausal women
10 年研究表明 DBT 在乳腺癌检测方面优于 2D 乳房 X 光检查根据一项为期 10 年的新研究，与传统的 2D 数字乳房 X 光检查相比，使用数字乳腺断层合成 (DBT) 筛查乳腺癌可提高癌症检出率，并显着降低晚期癌症的发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/10-year-study-shows-DBT-outperforms-2D-mammography-in-breast-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/10-year-study-shows-DBT-outperforms-2D-mammography-in-breast-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ee9a66e6-9eea-4e73-bf30-516da1704304 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 12:09:34 -0400 10-year study shows DBT outperforms 2D mammography in breast cancer detection
严重哮喘中的微生物-免疫相互作用：深入了解病原体优势和治疗方法研究人员评估气道微生物组和宿主免疫炎症反应，以确定严重哮喘的可治疗方面。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Microbial-immune-interactions-in-severe-asthma-Insights-into-pathogen-dominance-and-treatment-approaches.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Microbial-immune-interactions-in-severe-asthma-Insights-into-pathogen-dominance-and-treatment-approaches.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71ba34c4-3417-496e-9a84-a41eb3940108 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 09:49:00 -0400 Microbial-immune interactions in severe asthma: Insights into pathogen dominance and treatment approaches
孤独可能不是疾病的直接原因一项研究表明，孤独感与 13 种疾病类别相关，强调了孤独感作为潜在替代标记而非直接风险因素的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Loneiness-may-not-be-a-direct-cause-of-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240917/Loneiness-may-not-be-a-direct-cause-of-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed15d2e5-14ce-404d-84c0-4fac3dd8a4e0 Tue, 17 Sep 2024 08:24:00 -0400 Loneliness may not be a direct cause of disease
